Articles.Content:
I am using the fusion engine from the KSP Interstellar mod, to re-create the conical VISTA spacecraft.

Anyway, I need some tips.

1.Can you give me some tips on how to recreate the conical part of the spacecraft using structural panels?

2.Where should the RCS blocks go?

And on a completely unrelated note...

3. How do you make those 'bendy' supports?

:)Please get back to me soon!

Time for a mod with the specs required;

Yep, it is for real with unlimited tardis power built in.
